chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Sebban Balwer, p. 45 (44)—Pedron Niall's “dry little stick of a secretary.” He is in reality the Master of Spies for the Children of the Light; his identity is known only to Niall, since a decoy spymaster exists in the form of Abdel Omerna. See also Omerna, Abdel.
